name: a bridge to a destination
description:
A bridge to a destination is a third-person game. It is without of any implicit narrative, arc or goal. It has no protagonist, no grand conflict, and no judgment at the close. It has an end and it may be over quicker than you'd like.

 
Will you play?

  • Played with keyboard or gamepad, however mouse can be used in the main menu
  • By default, WSAD will move and choose & press enter to make a selection
  • Expect a duration of less than 10 minutes
  • Subtitles are available under the accessibility options.
